summary: Completed comprehensive testing of the rebuilt Equity Trust Portfolio platform. All backend APIs are functional, frontend pages load correctly, and core features work as expected. Fixed critical MongoDB ObjectId serialization issues in backend. Knowledge base, AI assistant, templates, and authentication flows all working properly.
passed_tests: Backend health check and root endpoint
Knowledge Base topics endpoint returns 10+ topics
Knowledge Base maxims endpoint returns 12+ maxims with tags
Knowledge Base relationships endpoint returns duty-right pairs
Templates endpoint returns 7 document templates
Sources endpoint returns PDF sources
AI Assistant chat endpoint returns grounded responses using GPT-4o
Protected endpoints return 401 without authentication
User authentication and session management
Dashboard stats endpoint returns portfolio/document/asset counts
Portfolio CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Trust profile creation and management
Asset creation and management
Notice creation and management
Document creation with versioning support
Document update creates new versions
Document version history retrieval
PDF export functionality for documents
Homepage loads with hero section and 4 feature cards
Knowledge Base page loads with 10 topics and search functionality
Maxims page loads with 13 maxims and filtering
Relationships page loads with 4 duty-right pairs and detail view
Templates page loads with 7 document templates
Source Library page loads correctly
AI Assistant page loads with chat interface and responds to queries
Login page loads with Google OAuth button
All navigation elements are clickable and functional

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (All major UI flows working, minor browser stability issue in extended testing)
